T02TD2025E:110b-1: sva aa dhishtha na tsa tu yo ga tad tva au pa de sha n'a ma /
T02TD2025E:110b-3: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag / bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2025E:110b-4: shin tu spros med thugs rjes brlan //
T02TD2025E:110b-5: dpal ldan bde chen phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2025E:110b-6: rang byin brlabs pa'i rim pa ni //
T02TD2025E:110b-7: bla ma'i drin gyis gsal bar bshad //
T02TD2025E:110b-8: bla ma la gus dam tshig can //
T02TD2025E:110b-9: snying rje sems can don sems pa'i //
T02TD2025E:110b-10: sgrub pos dben pa'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2025E:110b-11: dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2025E:111a-0: @111a * // rnal 'byor dam pa bzhir bshad do //
T02TD2025E:111a-1: dbyibs dang sngags dang byin rlabs dang //
T02TD2025E:111a-2: rnam dag ye shes zhes bya bas //
T02TD2025E:111a-4: rim pa'am yang na cig car dang //
T02TD2025E:111a-5: sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgom bya ste //
T02TD2025E:111a-6: gong bur gnas pa'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2025E:111a-7: lus 'di gshin rje gshed dmar po //
T02TD2025E:111a-8: 'di ni bems po ma yin la //
T02TD2025E:111a-9: sha dang khrag kyang de ma yin //
T02TD2025E:111a-10: bden min brdzun pa ma yin no //
T02TD2025E:111a-11: tha mal ma yin ye shes sku //
T02TD2025E:111a-12: dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2025E:111a-13: phun tshogs yon tan kun gyi rten //
T02TD2025E:111a-14: 'di ni bdag las tha dad med //
T02TD2025E:111a-15: spang zhing bsnan du cung zad med //
T02TD2025E:111a-16: ma 'khrul bla ma'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2025E:111a-17: gdod nas grub par shes bya ste //
T02TD2025E:111a-18: lus can kun gyis 'di mthong dang //
T02TD2025E:111a-19: gang gis thos dang dran tsam gyis //
T02TD2025E:111a-20: bsam pa rdzogs mdzad zung 'jug sku //
T02TD2025E:111a-21: de ltar bdag nyid gsal bar blta //
T02TD2025E:111a-22: bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon las//
T02TD2025E:111a-24: mthong thos dran pa'i spyod yul du //
T02TD2025E:111a-25: ma lus lus pa med pa yin //
T02TD2025E:111a-26: brtan g-yo'i dngos po ji snyed pa //
T02TD2025E:111a-27: dpal ldan gshin rje gshegs dmar po //
T02TD2025E:111a-28: khams gsum min 'di gzhal med khang //
T02TD2025E:111a-29: srog chags min 'di rgyal ba rnams //
T02TD2025E:111a-30: phung po khams dang skye mched min //
T02TD2025E:111a-32: rang bzhin 'od gsal ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2025E:111a-33: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar //
T02TD2025E:111a-34: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD2025E:111a-35: rmi lam ji bzhin goms byas te //
T02TD2025E:111a-36: bar ma'i srid pa rab sbyor bas //
T02TD2025E:111a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub thob //
T02TD2025E:111a-38: dbyibs kyi rim pa ste rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD2025E:111a-39: lus can rnams kyi srog gyur pa //
T02TD2025E:111a-40: rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed //
T02TD2025E:111a-41: 'di ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste //
T02TD2025E:111a-42: srid dang rnam grol thob byed pa'o //
T02TD2025E:111a-43: bya dra dang ni bha ra ta //
T02TD2025E:111a-44: mu sa la dang aa tra tas /
T02TD2025E:111a-45: thog mar lus ni spyang bar bya //
T02TD2025E:111a-46: lus sbyangs pas ni rtsa dang rlung ;
T02TD2025E:111a-47: / legs par dag pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2025E:111a-48: spros pa thams cad spangs nas so //
T02TD2025E:111a-49: mnyam par gzhag pas dngos grub thob //
T02TD2025E:111a-50: dgang ba'i sbyor bas dgang bya ste //
T02TD2025E:111a-51: dgug pa'i sbyor bas dgug par bya //
T02TD2025E:111a-52: zhi ba yis ni zhi ba nyid //
T02TD2025E:111a-53: rengs pa'i sbyor bas mi g-yo'o //
T02TD2025E:111b-0: sbyor ba bzhi yis @111b bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2025E:111b-1: dngos grub chen po skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2025E:111b-2: rtsa gsum zur gsum sbyangs nas ni //
T02TD2025E:111b-3: cung zad spyod lam dal bar bya //
T02TD2025E:111b-4: dbang po ngal zhing dub pa'i tshe //
T02TD2025E:111b-5: sems ni rtse gcig nyid du gzhag / du ba la sogs lnga po ni //
T02TD2025E:111b-7: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa //
T02TD2025E:111b-9: rlung gi g-yo bas 'khor ba ste //
T02TD2025E:111b-10: mi g-yo bas ni mya ngan 'das //
T02TD2025E:111b-11: snying gi chu skyes dbus sogs pas //
T02TD2025E:111b-12: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa thob //
T02TD2025E:111b-13: rnal 'byor pas ni mnyam gzhag pas //
T02TD2025E:111b-14: nang par bya rog mi grag par //
T02TD2025E:111b-15: 'jug pa'i rlung ni gang yin la //
T02TD2025E:111b-16: stong phrag gcig ni bgrang bar bya //
T02TD2025E:111b-17: sgrub pos sgra dang bral ba ni //
T02TD2025E:111b-18: 'bum phrag gcig ni rdzogs pa na //
T02TD2025E:111b-19: tshe zad pa yang lo lnga ru //
T02TD2025E:111b-21: snying ga'i h'um yig dkar po la //
T02TD2025E:111b-22: yul sogs dmigs par mi byed pas //
T02TD2025E:111b-23: rlung gi sbyor bas goms byed na //
T02TD2025E:111b-25: rnam shes gong du 'pho ba ni //
T02TD2025E:111b-26: 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe //
T02TD2025E:111b-27: bu ga rnams su son pa'i rtsa //
T02TD2025E:111b-28: yi ge rnams kyis dgab par bya //
T02TD2025E:111b-29: a'a li k'a li'i rlung gis ni //
T02TD2025E:111b-30: bu ga'i rlung ni spyang bar bya //
T02TD2025E:111b-31: snying ga'i h'um yig shes dang sbyar //
T02TD2025E:111b-32: phyed dang gnyis kyi yi ge ni /
T02TD2025E:111b-33: 'og dang steng du bzhag pa la //
T02TD2025E:111b-34: de yi 'og gi cha rlung gis //
T02TD2025E:111b-35: sa bon steng 'og bltas pa yis //
T02TD2025E:111b-36: rlung gi sa bon gnyis gzhag pas //
T02TD2025E:111b-37: rnal 'byor ldan pas kha sbyor bcing //
T02TD2025E:111b-38: yi ge phyed dang gnyis kyi sngags //
T02TD2025E:111b-39: nyi shu rtsa gcig rim par brjod //
T02TD2025E:111b-40: rlung ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste //
T02TD2025E:111b-41: gang dang gang du bgrod pa yi //
T02TD2025E:111b-42: rlung ni sgo ru brtsams pas te //
T02TD2025E:111b-43: dgug pa ldog pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2025E:111b-44: de ltar sbyangs pa'i goms pa las //
T02TD2025E:111b-45: grol ba'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
T02TD2025E:111b-46: sgo yi bye brag bshad par bya //
T02TD2025E:111b-48: gzugs khams smin mtshams thig le las //
T02TD2025E:111b-49: tshangs pa'i sgo nas gzugs med do //
T02TD2025E:111b-50: de ni mtho ris byed pa'o //
T02TD2025E:111b-51: sna nas gnod spyin gnas su skye //
T02TD2025E:111b-52: rna ba las ni mi 'am ci //
T02TD2025E:111b-53: mig las mi yi dbang por 'gyur //
T02TD2025E:111b-55: bshang ba las ni dmyal bar 'gyur//
T02TD2025E:112a-1: de ltar ma nus stobs chung ba //
T02TD2025E:112a-2: rnam shes bla mar 'pho ba ni //
T02TD2025E:112a-3: spros pa thams cad bcad nas ni //
T02TD2025E:112a-4: rgyal sras lam la gtang bar bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-5: lus ni legs par bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-6: yang na seng ge'i nyal thabs bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-7: rnam smin las grub phung po 'di //
T02TD2025E:112a-8: bla ma lha dang 'byung po la //
T02TD2025E:112a-9: stos pa med par gtang bar bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-10: mchog gi sgo ni gsal por dbye //
T02TD2025E:112a-11: snying gi chu skyes padmo yi //
T02TD2025E:112a-12: h'um las rnams shes bstim par bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-13: spyi bor bla ma lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD2025E:112a-14: dus gsum bde gshegs ro gcig pa //
T02TD2025E:112a-15: mchod sogs byas la gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2025E:112a-16: de nas rlung gi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2025E:112a-17: rnam shes thugs kar 'phang bar bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang //
T02TD2025E:112a-19: rang gi rnam shes dbyer med du //
T02TD2025E:112a-20: stong nyid snying rje ro gcig par //
T02TD2025E:112a-21: mi 'gyur bde ba bsgom par bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-22: de ni chos sku phrin las dang //
T02TD2025E:112a-23: bcas pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2025E:112a-24: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang //
T02TD2025E:112a-25: nyin bzhin bram ze gsod pa yang //
T02TD2025E:112a-27: sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2025E:112a-28: dus la babs na 'pho bar bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-29: dus min lha ni gsod par 'gyur //
T02TD2025E:112a-30: lha ni bsad pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2025E:112a-31: mnar med gnas su sreg par byed //
T02TD2025E:112a-32: 'di ni bde bar gnas dus su //
T02TD2025E:112a-33: cung zad goms par bya ba ste //
T02TD2025E:112a-35: sbyar te spro dang bsdu ba'i tshul //
T02TD2025E:112a-36: nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni //
T02TD2025E:112a-37: yud tsam mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-38: sngags kyi rim pa ste rjes su rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD2025E:112a-39: shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las //
T02TD2025E:112a-40: bla ma'i man ngag rim pa yis //
T02TD2025E:112a-41: srid pa'i sdug bsngal gzhom 'dod pas //
T02TD2025E:112a-42: mi 'gyur bde ba bsgom par bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-43: rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD2025E:112a-44: rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad //
T02TD2025E:112a-45: tsa rtsi ka ni padma can //
T02TD2025E:112a-46: phag mo glang po can du bshad //
T02TD2025E:112a-47: rdo rje dbyings can dung can ma //
T02TD2025E:112a-48: dkar mo ri mo can yin te //
T02TD2025E:112a-49: rigs ni bzhi yi mtshan nyid rnams //
T02TD2025E:112a-50: de ltar mkhas pas shes par bya //
T02TD2025E:112a-51: padma can gyi mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD2025E:112a-52: bzhin ni kun nas zlum po ste //
T02TD2025E:112a-53: sna ni zar ma'i me tog mtshungs //
T02TD2025E:112b-0: rus @112b sbal rgyab 'dra'i sen mo dmar //
T02TD2025E:112b-1: nu ma mkhregs shing 'jam pa dang //
T02TD2025E:112b-2: rkang mthil mnyam nas brang yang mdzes //
T02TD2025E:112b-3: ba spu 'khyil zhing ngang pa'i skad //
T02TD2025E:112b-4: ri mo gsum can chu skyes mchog / padma'i dri ldan glang chen 'gros //
T02TD2025E:112b-6: padma'i byed pas bsten phyir ste ;
T02TD2025E:112b-8: glang po can zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2025E:112b-9: sna g-yon pa spu 'khyil ba dang //
T02TD2025E:112b-11: chang gi dri ldan byin pa sbom //
T02TD2025E:112b-12: lus ni sbom la mi srun pa //
T02TD2025E:112b-13: bzhin gyi mdangs che nga ro che //
T02TD2025E:112b-14: glu dang rol mo la dga' ba //
T02TD2025E:112b-15: byed pa bcings ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2025E:112b-16: glang po che yi mchog sgrub byed //
T02TD2025E:112b-17: dung can ma zhes grags pa ni //
T02TD2025E:112b-18: ha cang skem zhing sbom pa min //
T02TD2025E:112b-19: skra ring sna yang cung zad ring //
T02TD2025E:112b-20: nu ma na ra ka 'bras ltar //
T02TD2025E:112b-21: zho dang 'o ma'i tshogs la dga' //
T02TD2025E:112b-22: bya rog skad can bung ba'i sgra //
T02TD2025E:112b-23: ba lang lce ltar rtsub pa ste //
T02TD2025E:112b-24: gi wang ra ta'i bcings pas bsten //
T02TD2025E:112b-25: ri mo can yang bshad par bya //
T02TD2025E:112b-26: shin tu khro zhing ngo tsha spangs //
T02TD2025E:112b-27: rtag tu rtsod pa la dga' zhing //
T02TD2025E:112b-28: lus thung de yi brang rnams mdzes //
T02TD2025E:112b-29: pa la'i 'bras ltar nu ma zab //
T02TD2025E:112b-30: byin pa phra zhing phyis gan nyal //
T02TD2025E:112b-31: gsus pa sbom zhing mchu yang 'phyang //
T02TD2025E:112b-32: sha ba'i dri ldan phug ron skad //
T02TD2025E:112b-33: de ni ri mo can zhes bya //
T02TD2025E:112b-34: pi las yi bcings pas bsten //
T02TD2025E:112b-35: ri mo can gyi dngos grub 'gyur //
T02TD2025E:112b-36: bcu drug lon pa'i skad bzang ma //
T02TD2025E:112b-37: gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum chogs //
T02TD2025E:112b-38: dang por legs par spyang ba dang //
T02TD2025E:112b-39: dbang bskur nas ni sgrub pa brtsam //
T02TD2025E:112b-40: sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni ;
T02TD2025E:112b-41: / dpral ba la sogs rnams su dgod //
T02TD2025E:112b-42: sv'a h'a gsang ba gtsug tor du'o //
T02TD2025E:112b-43: de nas padma rdo rje spyang //
T02TD2025E:112b-45: aa yis ze 'bru rab tu brtag / h'um gis rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02TD2025E:112b-46: phat kyis sgo la rab tu brtag / de ltar rdo rje padma bcas //
T02TD2025E:112b-47: bha gar ling+ga bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2025E:112b-48: byang chub sems ni spro mi bya //
T02TD2025E:112b-49: rnal 'byor pas ni gr'um phat bsam //
T02TD2025E:112b-50: bha gar rdo rje 'dzin par byed //
T02TD2025E:112b-51: khams gsum po ni ma lus pa //
T02TD2025E:112b-52: sangs rgyas ngo bor bsgom par bya //
T02TD2025E:112b-53: rgyu mthun la sogs rab dbye bas //
T02TD2025E:112b-54: shin tu rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
T02TD2025E:112b-55: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i //
T02TD2025E:112b-56: rtsa ni nye bar btsal bya ste //
T02TD2025E:113a-0: @113a * // byed pa bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2025E:113a-1: rnal 'byor pa yis ji srid dud //
T02TD2025E:113a-2: byang chub sems ni 'byin mi bya //
T02TD2025E:113a-3: gang tshe chu yi ri mo ltar //
T02TD2025E:113a-5: dga' ba las skyes de bzhin ci //
T02TD2025E:113a-6: dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa //
T02TD2025E:113a-7: byang chub sems ni nyams gyur na //
T02TD2025E:113a-8: phung po rnam shes brgyal 'gyur bas //
T02TD2025E:113a-9: ma smad dngos grub ga la thob //
T02TD2025E:113a-10: mkha' khams rdo rje kun sbyor dang //
T02TD2025E:113a-11: reg byas kyis ni rmad byung che //
T02TD2025E:113a-12: bde ba skyed par byed pa ni //
T02TD2025E:113a-13: mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o //
T02TD2025E:113a-14: dga' bral dag gi dbus su ni //
T02TD2025E:113a-15: mtshon par de ni bstan par bya //
T02TD2025E:113a-16: padma'i dbus su rdo rje ni //
T02TD2025E:113a-17: lte bas mnan pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02TD2025E:113a-18: rdo rje'i skyil krung las sems ni //
T02TD2025E:113a-19: nor bu'i nang du son pa ltar //
T02TD2025E:113a-20: ye shes skye ba gang yin pa //
T02TD2025E:113a-21: ye shes ngo bo zhes bya ba //
T02TD2025E:113a-22: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
T02TD2025E:113a-23: dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2025E:113a-24: gang tshe rnal 'byor ye shes mthong //
T02TD2025E:113a-25: bde ba gnas su 'gyur mi bya //
T02TD2025E:113a-26: thun mong yang na nyin gcig dang //
T02TD2025E:113a-27: zla phyed zla ba lo dang ni //
T02TD2025E:113a-28: bskal pa 'am bskal pa stong du yang //
T02TD2025E:113a-29: ye shes sbyor bas gnas par bya //
T02TD2025E:113a-30: byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor ba ste shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD2025E:113a-31: mkha' 'gro'i pho brang chu skyes dbus //
T02TD2025E:113a-32: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2025E:113a-33: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu dngos //
T02TD2025E:113a-34: rnal 'byor chen pos ngal bso bya //
T02TD2025E:113a-35: lte ba'i dbus son dpa' bo la //
T02TD2025E:113a-36: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2025E:113a-37: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la //
T02TD2025E:113a-38: ji ltar thim pa blta bar bya //
T02TD2025E:113a-39: lte ba'i chu skyes padmo la //
T02TD2025E:113a-40: yungs kar tsam du brtag bya gang //
T02TD2025E:113a-41: bde gsal ye shes nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2025E:113a-42: rtag pa ma yin chad pa min //
T02TD2025E:113a-43: bdag min gzhan yang ma yin la //
T02TD2025E:113a-44: srid min mya ngan 'das pa min //
T02TD2025E:113a-45: thog ma dbus mtha' rnam par spangs //
T02TD2025E:113a-46: 'od gsal ba las de gsal na //
T02TD2025E:113a-48: rnal 'byor bzhi yi rim pa las //
T02TD2025E:113a-49: gang skyes ye shes phyag rgya che //
T02TD2025E:113a-50: thabs dang shes rab rang gi dngos //
T02TD2025E:113a-51: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin //
T02TD2025E:113a-52: 'jig rten khyab byed gsal bar snang //
T02TD2025E:113a-53: mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba che //
T02TD2025E:113a-54: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med la //
T02TD2025E:113a-55: phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byung gnas kyi //
T02TD2025E:113b-1: ye shes kyi sbyor ba zhes bya ste rnal 'byor chen po'o //
T02TD2025E:113b-2: de ltar bla ma'i man ngag rjes 'brangs te //
T02TD2025E:113b-3: de nyid gsal byas brtse chen bzod par gsol //
T02TD2025E:113b-4: 'dir 'bad bsod nams dri med gang skyes des //
T02TD2025E:113b-5: srid gsum dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig //
T02TD2025E:113b-6: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag grub thob kyis 'khor los sgyur ba mthu stobs las mnga' brnyes pa /
T02TD2025E:113b-7: dpal ldan rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2025E:113b-9: // / da ra pan a'a ts'arya dang /
T02TD2025E:113b-10: glo bo lo ts'a bas bsgyur ba'o /
